Key Match Events: Harry Kane scored the opening goal for England at the 18th minute, Morten Hjulmand equalized for Denmark at the 34th minute with a great strike
Post-Match Reflections: Gareth Southgate admitted England need improvement after the draw with Denmark
Pierre-Emile Hojbjerg was named Player of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: England missed the opportunity to secure their passage to the second round of Euro 2024
Despite the poor display, England remain in control of Group C, topping the table on four points with Denmark and Slovenia next with two from two
